# Prior

```{r, warning = FALSE}
n <- 1000
alpha <- rep(0.01, 3)

rdirichlet(n, alpha) %>%
  as_tibble() %>%
  pivot_longer(everything()) %>%
  ggplot(aes(value)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 30) +
  facet_wrap(vars(name))
```
